text: hey guys it's Elise and welcome back to

I absolutely love horses so I think
these are gonna end up being one of my
new favorites the things that you need
of course you're gonna need some

of these really sweet little white

need to have them but in my opinion they
add a lot to the finished product I've
got some little flowers sprinkles some

bowl and some in a disposable piping bag
with a grass piping tip a grass piping
tip basically just has a ton of little

you poke nice neat grass I've got a
snack steal bag and a pair of scissors
of these a fireman paper and you'll also
need to click on the link I leave down
below and print out a horse template
let's get started so you want to put

bags and I've only got a little bit of

nice and thinly melted so with these

do all of the legs because the legs are

making like almost like a saddle sort of
a looking blob color that in you might

because you want to make sure that
you've got all of the horse features
done before that candy melts starts to
dry too much
if you're having trouble melting your

easy to pipe check out my how to melt

there all the little lumps and bumps

however you like so once you've got all

gonna curl a little bit pop them off to

while we're waiting
so frosting today I'm gonna use is a

don't have to do grass tip for every

don't handle these for too long they're

make sure that you're putting the

stick anymore so incredibly cute not too
